body_html:
@LowBoonKeong What the error message states is that if can't find the right cl.exe for compiling the extension. So it will be okay if run it in the x86_amd64 Developer Command Prompt for MSVC 2017 and type in the following commands.

set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
cd [your_extension_path]
python build.py
body_text:
@LowBoonKeong  What the error message states is that if can't find the right cl.exe for compiling the extension. So it will be okay if run it in the x86_amd64 Developer Command Prompt for MSVC 2017 and type in the following commands.
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
cd [your_extension_path]
python build.py
body:
@LowBoonKeong  What the error message states is that if can't find the right cl.exe for compiling the extension. So it will be okay if run it in the x86_amd64 Developer Command Prompt for MSVC 2017 and type in the following commands.
```CMD
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
cd [your_extension_path]
python build.py
```
